name: instant-data-lake-stack
label: Instant Data Lake (Foundation, Analytics, Integration)
short_description: Quickly deploy a serverless data lake foundation (free tier) or add Cognos Analytics (trial) or App Connect (free tier).
long_description:
Get started instantly with a serverless data lake. Choose your flavor:
1. **Foundation:** Core object storage & SQL query (uses free tiers).
2. **Analytics:** Foundation + Cognos Analytics for BI (30-day trial, then paid).
3. **Integration:** Foundation + App Connect for simple workflows (uses free Lite tier).
Zero-input deployment with sensible defaults. Always check current IBM Cloud pricing.
